description: Quick use so not a detailed review. Immediately worked with integrated laptop webcam, froze image as soon as QR was detected, provided a working link that did take some time to trigger my browser, but the raw result was there in plain text for my on purposes; excellent idea.
summary: Does one thing well, as it should be

description: This is a very modern QR Reader that blends really nicely with your GNOME Desktop. I didn't give it 5 stars because it still needs more polish.
It works as a QR reader just as it said, but it could use some work because its interface looks unpolished and doesn't feel as nice to use as other GNOME apps.

The installation was on a Fedora 34 and when I ran it the first time, it did pick up the QR code but the whole app was frozen. It did not display the results of the scan. I killed off that process and re-ran it and this time it detected very quickly and gave me the results. Not sure why the 1st run was frozen, but is seems to be OK now.
Does what it's supposed to. Didn't have any problems using it.

Does what it supposed to do and does it good. I've used it to read some qr codes from webpages for totp passwords which didn't provide secrets in open text.

UI could be nicer but I didn't have bigger issues with finding values which I was looking for so 5 star
Gostei principalmente porque consigo importar uma imagem e ele lê o qrcode, porque a maioria dos apps obrigatoriamente usam a câmera
I needed to quickly scan a barcode into my laptop. Installed this app and it did its job.
Works as expected but the copy button in the image scan tab could be more polished
Does exactly what it should. No other software I came across could pipe to the network instance.

Удобная программа, когда нужно прочитать QR-код в ноутбук или ПК, имеет мало аналогов. Сканирует с видеокамеры и со станичного изображения. Интерфейс на русском языке. Не все функции работают: Ctrl+V не вставляет картинку в область просмотра. Работает: перетаскивание картинки в просмотр и обычное открытие через обзор папок. Конкурент - ClipQR
